name: Social Safety Net Champions
title: Highest Social Contributions as Revenue
description: In 2022, Germany allocated 56.03% of its revenue to social contributions, showcasing its commitment to social welfare and public services.

name: Education Marathon
title: Longest Secondary Education Duration
description: German students experience a comprehensive education system with a secondary education duration of 9 years as of 2023, one of the longest globally.

name: Healthy Start for Kids
title: Low Prevalence of Malnutrition in Children
description: Germany has one of the lowest rates of malnutrition among children under 5, with only 0.2% of females underweight and 0.7% of males overweight as of 2016.

name: Capital Account Conundrum
title: Negative Net Capital Account
description: In 2023, Germany faced a net capital account deficit of $28.71 billion, indicating more capital leaving the country than entering.
